analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/26/0xdb0f0c31d8379965aa88d5506f0f31ea67ea98e8.sol:
	Contract VRXToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0xdb0f0c31d8379965aa88d5506f0f31ea67ea98e8.sol#203-204)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/26/0xdb0f0c31d8379965aa88d5506f0f31ea67ea98e8.sol#71-72) is not in mixedCase
